00018 #ifdef WIN32
00019 #define ecvt _ecvt
00020 #endif // WIN32
00021 
00022 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
00023 #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(ptr) if (ptr != NULL) { delete [] ptr; ptr = NULL; }
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 template <class Char, class FloatType>
00027 void FloatToString(FloatType f, Char* sz)
00028 {
00029     Char* buffer = sz + 1;
00030     static const int digitCount = 6;
00031     int decimal, sign;
00032     char* end = ecvt(f, digitCount, &decimal, &sign);
00033 
00034 
00035     if (sign != 0) (*buffer++) = '-';
00036     int count = digitCount;
00037     if (decimal > 0)
00038     {
00039         for (int i = 0; i < decimal; ++i) (*buffer++) = (*end++);
00040         if (decimal < digitCount) (*buffer++) = '.';
00041         count = digitCount - decimal;
00042     }
00043     else if (decimal < -digitCount)
00044     {
00045         decimal = count = 0;
00046     }
00047     else if (decimal < 0 || (decimal == 0 && *end != '0'))
00048     {
00049         (*buffer++) = '0'; (*buffer++) = '.';
00050         for (int i = 0; i < -decimal; ++i) (*buffer++) = '0';
00051         count = digitCount + decimal;
00052     }
00053     for (; count >= 0; --count) if (end[count - 1] != '0') break;
00054     for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) (*buffer++) = (*end++);
00055     if (decimal == 0 && count == 0) (*buffer++) = '0';
00056     if (buffer[-1] == '.') --buffer;
00057     (*buffer) = 0;
00058 }

00060 template <class Char>
00061 FUStringBuilderT<Char>::FUStringBuilderT(const String& sz)
00062 {
00063     this->buffer = NULL;
00064     this->size = 0;
00065     this->reserved = 0;
00066     
00067     reserve(sz.size() + 32);
00068     append(sz.c_str());
00069 }
00070 
00071 template <class Char>
00072 FUStringBuilderT<Char>::FUStringBuilderT(const Char* sz)
00073 {
00074     this->buffer = NULL;
00075     this->size = 0;
00076     this->reserved = 0;
00077 
00078     size_t len = 0;
00079     for (const Char* p = sz; *p != 0; ++p) ++len;
00080     reserve(len + 32);
00081     append(sz);
00082 }
00083 
00084 template <class Char>
00085 FUStringBuilderT<Char>::FUStringBuilderT(Char ch, size_t count)
00086 {
00087     this->buffer = NULL;
00088     this->size = 0;
00089     this->reserved = 0;
00090 
00091     reserve(count + 32);
00092     for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) buffer[size++] = ch;
00093 }

00099     this->size = 0;
00100     this->reserved = 0;

00109     this->size = 0;
00110     this->reserved = 0;

00113     reserve(32);

00118 FUStringBuilderT<Char>::~FUStringBuilderT()
00119 {
00120     reserve(0);

00123 template <class Char>
00124 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::enlarge(size_t minimum)
00125 {
00126     reserve(max(reserved + minimum + 32, 2 * reserved + 32));
00127 }

00129 template <class Char>
00130 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::clear()
00131 {
00132     size = 0;
00133 }

00135 template <class Char>
00136 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::reserve(size_t _length)
00137 {
00138     FUAssert(size <= reserved, );
00139     if (_length > reserved)
00140     {
00141         Char* b = new Char[_length];
00142         memcpy(b, buffer, size * sizeof(Char));
00143         SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(buffer);
00144         buffer = b;
00145         reserved = _length;
00146     }
00147     else if (_length == 0)
00148     {
00149         SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(buffer);
00150         size = reserved = 0;
00151     }
00152     else if (_length < reserved)
00153     {
00154         size_t realSize = min(size, _length);
00155         Char* b = new Char[_length];
00156         memcpy(b, buffer, realSize * sizeof(Char));
00157         SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(buffer);
00158         buffer = b;
00159         reserved = _length;
00160         size = realSize;
00161     }
00162 }

00164 template <class Char>
00165 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::append(Char c)
00166 {
00167     if (size + 1 >= reserved) enlarge(2);
00168 
00169     buffer[size++] = c;
00170 }

00172 template <class Char>
00173 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::append(const String& sz) { append(sz.c_str()); }
00174 template <class Char>
00175 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::append(const Char* sz)
00176 {
00177     // This is optimized for SMALL strings.
00178     for (; *sz != 0; ++sz)
00179     {
00180         if (size >= reserved) enlarge(64);
00181         buffer[size++] = *sz;
00182     }
00183 }
00184 template <class Char>
00185 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::append(const FUStringBuilderT& b)
00186 {
00187     if (size + b.size >= reserved) enlarge(64 + size + b.size - reserved);
00188     memcpy(buffer + size, b.buffer, b.size * sizeof(Char));
00189     size += b.size;
00190 }
00191 
00192 template <class Char>
00193 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::append(float f)
00194 {
00195 #ifdef WIN32
00196     // use <float.h> _isnan method to detect the 1.#IND00 NaN.
00197     if (f != std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::signaling_NaN() && !_isnan((double)f) )
00198 #else
00199     if (f != std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::signaling_NaN() )
00200 #endif
00201     {
00202         if (IsEquivalent(f, 0.0f, std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon())) append('0');
00203         else
00204         {
00205             Char sz[128];
00206             FloatToString(f, sz);
00207             append(sz + 1);
00208         }
00209     }
00210     else if (f == std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity())
00211     { append('I'); append('N'); append('F'); }
00212     else if (f == -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity())
00213     { append('-'); append('I'); append('N'); append('F'); }
00214     else
00215     { append('N'); append('a'); append('N'); }
00216 }
00217 
00218 template <class Char>
00219 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::append(double f)
00220 {
00221 #ifdef WIN32
00222     // use <float.h> _isnan method to detect the .#IND00 NaN.
00223     if (f != std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::signaling_NaN() && !_isnan(f) )
00224 #else
00225     if (f != std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() && f != std::numeric_limits<float>::signaling_NaN() )
00226 #endif
00227     {
00228         if (IsEquivalent(f, 0.0, std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon())) append('0');
00229         else
00230         {
00231             Char sz[128];
00232             FloatToString(f, sz);
00233             append(sz + 1);
00234         }
00235     }
00236     else if (f == std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity())
00237     { append('I'); append('N'); append('F'); }
00238     else if (f == -std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity())
00239     { append('-'); append('I'); append('N'); append('F'); }
00240     else
00241     { append('N'); append('a'); append('N'); }
00242 }

00244 template <class Char>
00245 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::appendLine(const Char* sz)
00246 {
00247     append(sz);
00248     append('\n');
00249 }

00251 template <class Char>
00252 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::appendHex(uint8 i)
00253 {
00254     uint8 top = (i & 0xF0) >> 4;
00255     uint8 bot = i & 0xF;
00256     if (top <= 0x9) append((Char) ('0' + top));
00257     else append((Char) ('A' + (top - 0xA)));
00258     if (bot <= 0x9) append((Char) ('0' + bot));
00259     else append((Char) ('A' + (bot - 0xA)));
00260 }

00262 template <class Char>
00263 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::remove(int32 start)
00264 {
00265     if ((int32)size > start && start >= 0) size = start;
00266 }
00267 
00268 template <class Char>
00269 void FUStringBuilderT<Char>::remove(int32 start, int32 end)
00270 {
00271     int32 diff = end - start;
00272     if ((int32)size >= end && start >= 0 && diff > 0)
00273     {
00274         const Char* stop = buffer + size - diff;
00275         for (Char* p = buffer + start; p != stop; ++p)
00276         {
00277             *p = *(p + diff);
00278         }
00279         size -= diff;
00280     }
00281 }

00283 template <class Char> 
00284 const Char* FUStringBuilderT<Char>::ToCharPtr() const
00285 {
00286     FUStringBuilderT<Char>* ncThis = const_cast< FUStringBuilderT<Char>* >(this);
00287     if (size + 1 > reserved) ncThis->enlarge(1);
00288     ncThis->buffer[size] = 0;
00289     return buffer;
00290 }
00291 
00292 template <class Char>
00293 int32 FUStringBuilderT<Char>::index(Char c) const
00294 {
00295     if (buffer != NULL && size > 0)
00296     {
00297         const Char* end = buffer + size + 1;
00298         for (const Char* p = buffer; p != end; ++p)
00299         {
00300             if (*p == c) return (int32)(p - buffer);
00301         }
00302     }
00303     return -1;
00304 }
00305 
00306 template <class Char>
00307 int32 FUStringBuilderT<Char>::rindex(Char c) const
00308 {
00309     if (buffer != NULL && size > 0)
00310     {
00311         for (const Char* p = buffer + size - 1; p != buffer; --p)
00312         {
00313             if (*p == c) return (int32)(p - buffer);
00314         }
00315     }
00316     return -1;
00317 }
